sentences.en: a marginal improvement in weather conditions
An improvement in living standards could be years away.
sentences.cn: 可能多年之后生活水平才能得到提高。

sentences.en: Are you making some improvements to your home?
sentences.cn: 你在改善家里的居住条件吗？

sentences.en: CBS's ratings again showed huge improvement over the previous year.
sentences.cn: 与前一年相比，哥伦比亚广播公司的收视率再次大幅提高。

sentences.en: Compact discs have brought about a vast improvement in recorded sound quality.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片极大地提高了录音的音质。

sentences.en: Despite signs of an improvement in the economy, there is no room for complacency.
sentences.cn: 尽管在经济方面有改善的迹象，但仍不容自满。

sentences.en: Doctors say he has made a slight improvement.
sentences.cn: 医生说他的病情稍有好转。

sentences.en: He sees no signs of improvement in the UK and continental economy.
sentences.cn: 他看不到英国与欧洲大陆经济好转的迹象。

sentences.en: His visit is direct evidence of the improvement in their relationship.
sentences.cn: 他的到访是他们之间关系已有所改善的明证。

sentences.en: I can detect signs of improvement in your thinking.
sentences.cn: 我可以察觉出你思考问题方面的进步.

sentences.en: Lonrho's mining and minerals businesses showed some improvement.
sentences.cn: 朗荷公司的采矿及矿产业务有了些起色。

sentences.en: Our results have shown some improvement this month.
sentences.cn: 我们的成绩这个月有所提高。

sentences.en: Sales figures continue to show signs of improvement.
sentences.cn: 销售额持续显示出增加的迹象。

sentences.en: The doctor noticed a gradual improvement in his patient.
sentences.cn: 医生注意到病人在逐渐恢复健康.

sentences.en: The system we introduced in 1980 has been a great improvement.
sentences.cn: 我们1980年引进的系统有了很大改进。

sentences.en: There has already been a definite improvement.
There's still plenty of scope for improvement.
